title: #463 Raaaaage with Robert Kelly
itunes:title: Raaaaage with Robert Kelly
description:
Standup comedian Robert Kelly is not in control of his emotions. He sat down with me, who is known to be emotionless, and told me about his problems controlling his anger. Generally Bobby is one of the sweetest guys in comedy. But sometimes he hulks out and it’s one of the wildest things you’ll ever witness. He completely rages and can’t get it under control for a while. But he always tries to make things right afterwards. 

We discussed all that and our upcoming tour dates together in Michigan at the end of March all while smoking one of Robert’s favorite cigars, the Long Live The King from the Caldwell Collection. This might be the beginning of a great new video series but let us know what you think of the idea in the comments and if you have any thoughts on how to make it work and how to tweak it.

Get tickets now - Michigan Tour with Ari Shaffir, Big Jay Oakerson & Robert Kelly

  • March 24: Ft. Wayne - Summit City Comedy Club
  • March 25: Grand Rapids - GLC Live at 20 Monroe
  • March 26: Detroit -The Fillmore

For More Ari:

  • Upcoming Shows & Tickets

  • Merch & More

For more Bobby Kelly: 

  • Instagram - @robertkellylive
  • Twitter - @robertkelly
  • You Know What Dude - YouTube
  • Bobby's Patreon 

 The Music:

Angry again - Megadeath

Oasis - Don’t Look Back In Anger

SAY ANYTHING- I Hate Everyone

Theme from Incredible Hulk

 

Thanks to our sponsors! Go to BetterHelp.com/Ari for 10% off your first month and head to 3Chi.com for 5% off your order with promo code "Ari."
